placeholders.body_non_bullets:
The 3D metrology buying committee in discrete mfg spans Ops (economic), Quality (technical), Metrology/QA (users), Manufacturing Engineering (integration), Procurement (commercial), and IT/OT (security).
Influencers: system integrators, machine tool OEMs, peer plants, and corporate standards.
